name: 高等無機化學（二）
description: Understanding the basis (including source, usage, and reaction) of all elements
goals: Understanding the basis (including source, usage, and reaction) of all elements
syllabus:
1.  Reviewing elements of periodic table
2.  Electronic structure and properties of organometallic complexes
3.  Coordination chemistry
4.  d-metal organometallic chemistry
5.  Solid state chemistry
6.  Biological inorganic chemistry

All of topics will be addressed by the practices of computational modeling.
